attributes.action: Reduce the time a work can be intellectually protected before being released to the public domain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to shorten the length of time an intellectual property rights holder's work can be intellectually protected, before it is released to the public domain. Once Within the public domain, where the work can be reused, thus increasing the size of the creative industries for the public.
